mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM material as m WHERE m.caseId=#{id} and precase=1

select
from trademark_case_pre a left join agency b on a.agencyId=b.id where a.custId = #{custId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.agencyId=#{agencyId,jdbcType=INTEGER} limit 1
mapper.delete: delete from trademark_case_pre where custId = #{custId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and agencyId=#{agencyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
